flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: If it flaps itsnwings really fast,nit can generatefshock waves thatnwill shatter win­ndows in the area.
Its large eyes cannscan 360 degrees.nIt looks in allfdirections to seeknout insects as itsnprey.
It can see in allndirections withoutnmoving its bigfeyes, helping itnspot attackers andnfood right away.

YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degreesnwithout having to move its eyes.nIt is a great flier that is adept atfmaking sudden stops and turning midair.nThis POKéMON uses its flying ability tonquickly chase down targeted prey.

YANMA is capable of seeing 360 degreesnwithout having to move its eyes.nIt is a great flier that is adept atfmaking sudden stops and turning midair.nThis POKéMON uses its flying ability tonquickly chase down targeted prey.
It can see 360 degrees without movingnits eyes. It is a great flier capable ofnmaking sudden stops and turning midair tonquickly chase down targeted prey.
Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees.nIt looks in all directions to seek outninsects as its prey.
If it flaps its wings really fast, it canngenerate shock waves that will shatternwindows in the area.
Its eyes can see 360 degreesnwithout moving its head. It won’tnmiss prey--even those behind it.
Its eyes can see 360 degreesnwithout moving its head. It won’tnmiss prey--even those behind it.
It can hover in one spot bynflapping its wings at high speed. Itnflits about to guard its territory.
If it flaps its wings really fast,nit can generate shock waves thatnwill shatter windows in the area.
Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees.nIt looks in all directions to seeknout insects as its prey.
La vitesse de ses ailes lui permetnun vol stationnaire. Il surveillenainsi tout son territoire.
It can hover in one spot bynflapping its wings at high speed. Itnflits about to guard its territory.
La vitesse de ses ailes lui permetnun vol stationnaire. Il surveillenainsi tout son territoire.
It can hover in one spot bynflapping its wings at high speed. Itnflits about to guard its territory.
By flapping its wings at high speed,nit can fly freely through the air.nEven sudden stops are no problem.
By flapping its wings at high speed,nit can fly freely through the air.nEven sudden stops are no problem.
かおを　うごかさずに　３６０どnすべてを　みわたす　めを　もつのでnまうしろの　えものも　みのがさない。
얼굴을 움직이지 않고 360도 전부n볼 수 있는 눈을 가지고 있어서n바로 뒤의 먹이도 놓치지 않는다.
Il voit à 360° sans avoir à tourner la tête. Il ne loupenjamais une proie, même dans son dos.
Mit seinen Augen hat es einen Blickwinkel vonn360 Grad. Es sieht sogar Beute, die sich hinter ihmnbefindet.
Su campo visual es de 360° sin girar la cabeza.nDetecta hasta las presas que están a su espalda.
Ha un campo visivo a 360 gradi senza muovere lantesta. Riesce a vedere persino le prede alle sue spalle.
Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving itsnhead. It won’t miss prey--even those behind it.
顔を　動かさずに　３６０度nすべてを　見渡す　目を　持つのでn真後ろの　獲物も　見逃さない。
こうそくで　ハネを　はばたかせるとnしょうげきは　が　はっせいしてnまわりの　まどガラスが　われていく。
고속으로 날개를 치면n충격파가 발생해서n주변의 유리창이 깨진다.
En battant des ailes très vite, il peut générer unenviolente onde de choc qui peut briser les fenêtres.
Schlägt es schnell mit den Flügeln, erzeugt esnSchockwellen, durch die sogar Fenster zerbersten.
Si aletea muy rápido, genera ondas expansivasncapaces de hacer añicos todas las ventanas próximas.
Se agita le ali ad altissima velocità può generare ondenche distruggono i vetri delle finestre nella zona.
If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shocknwaves that will shatter windows in the area.
高速で　羽を　羽ばたかせるとn衝撃波が　発生してnまわりの　窓ガラスが　割れていく。
めだまを　うごかさずに　３６０ど　みわたせる。nきゅうブレーキや　ほうこうてんかんが　とくい。nねらった　えものを　すばやく　おいつめていく。
눈알을 움직이지 않고 360도를 볼 수 있다.n급브레이크나 방향 전환이 특기다.n노린 먹이를 빠르게 몰아넣는다.
Yanma a un champ de vision de 360 degrés sans avoir besoinnde bouger les yeux. Il vole incroyablement bien et peut fairendes figures acrobatiques. Ce Pokémon descend en piquénsur ses proies.

Yanma hat einen Blickwinkel von 360 Grad, ohne die Augennbewegen zu müssen. Es ist ein großartiger Flieger und geübtndarin, plötzlich anzuhalten oder Wendemanöver vorzunehmen.nSo kann es sich blitzschnell auf Beute stürzen.

Yanma tiene un ángulo de visión de 360° sin mover los ojos.nEs un gran volador, experto en hacer repentinas paradas yncambios de dirección en el aire. Aprovecha la habilidad quentiene de volar para lanzarse sobre su presa.

Yanma è dotato di un campo visivo a 360 gradi senza bisognondi muovere gli occhi. Grazie alle grandi ali riesce a fermarsinimprovvisamente e virare a mezz’aria. Sfrutta la sua abilitànin volo per abbattere la preda al suolo.

Yanma is capable of seeing 360 degrees without having tonmove its eyes. It is a great flier that is adept at making suddennstops and turning midair. This Pokémon uses its flying ability tonquickly chase down targeted prey.
目玉を　動かさずに　３６０度　見渡せる。n急ブレーキや　方向転換が　得意。nねらった　獲物を　素早く　追いつめていく。
めだまを　うごかさずに　３６０ど　みわたせる。nきゅうブレーキや　ほうこうてんかんが　とくい。nねらった　えものを　すばやく　おいつめていく。
